name: Asteroids-lite
description:
Hi ! 

If you have 30 seconds to spare, you can download and install Asteroids-lite.

Asteroids-Lite is the copy of the game of the same name publish a few years ago (1979). 

This game developed in C ++ with the SFML library  I developed with a tutorial. (Udemy)

Enjoy ?

Sources :

https://github.com/MWRonanD/Asteroids-lite
